parameters.name: Immediately
parameters.description: Specifies whether to release the instance immediately. The default value is false. If this parameter is set to false, the instance data is retained for 7 days before it is deleted. If this parameter is set to true, the instance data is deleted immediately.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. To obtain the instance ID, call the [GetLindormInstanceList](~~426069~~) operation.
